title: LP system so broke

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I play a game as Wukong and go 11/0/7 and we end the game after about 25 minutes and gain 15 lp. After this game i play support as thresh and my ADC is afk from lvl 1 and i start to build adc and go 13/10/13 and we lose after 50 odd minutes. I lose 21 lp. WTF, that is just dumb and they need to fix the retarted LP system.

replies.body:
Your MMR is low, you complete scrublord.

Learn how something works before you critique it, you nub.

30W 37L 

The Average MMR for this league is 936.
Yours is: 761
